markdownRemark.html:
I made the clip below in about 5 minutes using iMovie for iOS 7.

Think about this for a minute.

This is a 1080p video. It includes:

  • Transitions
  • Cuts
  • Text overlays
  • Animated titles
  • Music

Shot, edited and distributed…in 5 minutes.

That’s the power of post-PC devices.

frontmatter.title: 13-inch MacBook Pro with Retina display (late 2013 model) and iPad
